english.segment1: Sick Boy in his faded blue jeans - Sick Boy. Black leather jacket seen - Sick Boy. Always in trouble with the law. Don't ya know? owayo - Sick Boy. He carries a switchblade knife - Sick Boy. Likes to get into fights - Sick Boy. He'll go drinkin' with the boys. All night long. owayo - Sick Boy. Naa naa naa naa - Sick Boy. Owayo - Sick Boy. Naa naa naa naa - Sick Boy. Owayo - Sick Boy. He rides a big motor bike - Sick Boy. He combs his hair up just right - Sick Boy. With tatoos up and down his arms. Don't ya know? owayo - Sick Boy. He's got a girl wrapped around his arm - Sick Boy. With his street-like charm - Sick Boy. He'll hang out with her all night. Don't ya know? owayo - Sick Boy. Naa naa naa naa - Sick Boy. Owayo - Sick Boy. Naa naa naa naa - Sick Boy. Owayo - Sick Boy. Such a sick boy. We're all sick boys. I'm a sick boy. Naa naa naa naa naa naa
